update t_car_data_index
data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dataformat = #{dataformat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_car_data_index set data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dataformat = #{dataformat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_id = #{listId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select data_id, data_type, tcd.order_id,tcd.createtime, dataformat, display_name, tcd.list_id, tcd.catalog_id, tcd.disabled, tcdc.catalog_name,data, tcdl.list_name from t_car_data_index tcd join t_car_data_catalog tcdc on tcd.catalog_id = tcdc.catalog_id left join t_car_data_list tcdl on tcd.list_id = tcdl.list_id where tcd.disabled='0'
select count(data_id) from t_car_data_index where disabled='0' and catalog_id = #{catalogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select from t_car_data_index where disabled='0' and display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.update: update t_car_data_index set disabled='1' where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
